const horaActual = new Date().getTime();
flow.set('time1Puerta', horaActual)
flow.set('time2Puerta', horaActual)
flow.set('time1Garaje', horaActual)
flow.set('time2Garaje', horaActual)
flow.set('isOnline', true)
flow.set('enabled',1)
flow.set('publicIP',"")
msg = null;

searchRequestDoor
func:
const cameraIp= flow.get('publicIP');
const cameraChannel = msg.cameraChannel
const openTime = new Date (flow.get('time1Puerta'));
const bogotaTime = new Date(openTime.getTime() - 5 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
const startTime = formatTime(bogotaTime); // Remove milliseconds and keep the trailing Z

const secondsToAdd = 10
const endBogotaTime = new Date(bogotaTime.getTime() + secondsToAdd * 1000);
const endTime = formatTime(endBogotaTime);

function formatTime(time) {
  return time.toISOString().replace(/\.\d{3}Z$/, 'Z');
}

let body = `
<CMSearchDescription>
  <searchID>C77384AD-66A0-0001-E7C2-1151F04F90B0</searchID>
  <trackIDList>
    <trackID>${cameraChannel}</trackID>
  </trackIDList>
  <timeSpanList>
    <timeSpan>
      <startTime>${startTime}</startTime>
      <endTime>${endTime}</endTime>
    </timeSpan>
  </timeSpanList>
  <maxResults>10</maxResults>
  <searchResultPostion>0</searchResultPostion>
  <metadataList>
    <metadataDescriptor>//recordType.meta.std-cgi.com</metadataDescriptor>
  </metadataList>
</CMSearchDescription>
`
msg = {
  ip: cameraIp,
  url: `http://${cameraIp}:8081/ISAPI/ContentMgmt/search`,
  method: "GET",
  payload: body,
}
return msg;
